name: Spod Land II Turbo
overview: A Spodland game created by Martin Fox and Andrew Crowe and released as Manta Soft in 1997. Shoot at the other Spodz, certain combinations will cause your shots to impact shots from others and not make it to target. Take down the others to win. Several levels to choose from and choose the tracker mod file you want to listen to as you take down your enemies.
